text:

Have some tips when it comes to dating your ex? Share them in the comments below and weâ€™ll dissect them carefully to ensure it never happens again. 
My hot tip, leave the ultimatums (me or your pet, one has to go) out of the relationship unless you want to end up face down in a gutter somewhere. 2
